subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Willamette University women’s basketball coach Bruce Henderson collapsed at Monday’s practice and later died, apparently from a heart attack. Henderson, 47, was in his fourth season at the Division III program. A game scheduled for Tuesday night was canceled, and the team will not resume competition until after the holiday break.
